page.title: 14Work In The Area
page.content: Although Bransgore is a rural area there are many opportunities for people to find work locally. As you would expect many jobs can be found on the farms and local estates. For example jobs like Game Keeper, Woodman, Estate Manager, Nursery work, Dairyman. Work can also be found in the local Shops, Health Centre, Estate Agents and Banks. These provide more skilled or professional work such as Butchery, Hair Stylists, Cashier, Doctors, Nurses and Bank Managers. There are also openings for work driving Taxis, working in local garages and in the building trade, including the specialist work of thatching.
